thread.section_title: RI Student Loan Authority/College Planning Center of RI Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of RI Student Loan Authority/College Planning Center of RI | www.risla.com | 3 of 10
thread.title: AChambers
thread.title_full: RI Student Loan Authority/College Planning Center of RI reviewed by AChambers

author: AChambers
title: AChambers
text: For the past 3 years now, my daughter and I have worked with Courtney to get all the many details we needed for college ready by the required deadlines. At times, this paperwork can seem overwhelming particularly when it comes to scholarships, college applications and the financials. Courtney has been a godsend. She made it easy for us to get through the process unscathed. Each year we return for our FASA updates. I can't thank her enough! The college planning center is a wonderful resource for parents and students.
